repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p: The second part of a Tamil-French dictionary by Édouard Ariel. See BnF Indien 497 for the first part.
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (October 2021).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

collation.desc: the front cover. Selfmark on the verso.
1 folio = front guard leaf. No foliation. Verso blank. Element of library binding. Shelfmarks on the recto.
468 folios = Tamil-French Dictionary. Library Arabic foliation 1-468. Verso regularly left blank.
1 folio = back guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso. Element of library binding.

additions.desc:
Title printed on a sticker pasted on the spine:
ARIEL
DICTIONNAIRE
TAMOUL. .
BnF shelfmark sticker INDIEN 498 (front cover, verso).
BnF Shelfmarks Tamoul N° 498 in black pencil, Tamoul 498 in black ink and Indien 119. in black ink (f[1]r).
BnF stamps BIBLIOTHÈQUE IMPÉRIALE MSS. (f1r and f468v) and DON N° (f1r).
Société Asiatique stamps SOCIÉTÉ ASIATIQUE and SOCIÉTÉ ASIATIQUE. DON. COLLECTION ARIEL (f1r).

binding.p: Hard paper covers. Title on the spine.

provenance.p: Autograph work by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequeathed by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 70, no. 497-498.
James, Gregory. 2000. Colporuḷ: A History of Tamil Dictionaries. 1st edition. Chennai: Cre-A. — See pp. 198ff., 705.
Rosny, Léon de. 1868. La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. In Variétés orientales, 177‒224. Paris: Maisonneuve.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 114r, no. 497-498.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Revised by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, May 2022.

body.ab:
cakōtarar les frères prêcheurs. ms. chr. Pons.
vōrakam lettre. Eḻuttu . y.a.
la i.e. vōlakam d°. y.a.
blank
ṉakaram dernière lettre de l'alphabet 9,66.
ṟūnam
text upside down, bottom left of page; folio reused Acaittiṭukiṟa
